metadata.title: CVE-2018-15871 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered indecompileSingleArgBuiltInFunctionCall in libming 0.4.8 before 2018-03-12.The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, whichleads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
